name: Sacrifice (itch) (GGenp)
description:
Project 3 for Experimental Game Design, Spring 2023.

Created by: G Li.

Controls:

  • Click to select or interact
  • Space to unselect
  • Esc to quit to the title screen

Debug Commands:

  • Keyboard 1: Complete monster yield timer
  • Keyboard 2: Complete ritual timer
  • Keyboard 3: Add currency
  • Keyboard 4: Make all monsters starve
  • Keyboard 5: Make all monsters hungry

Known Bugs:

  • Under certain conditions, monsters are unable to die when they are supposed to, which might also cause other problems
